Param.name: text
Param.val:
You will now complete 4 practice trials. 

Select the easy task first and the hard task second. 

Then choose either task difficulty for the remaining rounds. 

Points are not earned on the practice trials. 

Press ENTER to begin the practice.

Param.name: Begin Experiment
Param.val:
from psychopy import visual
import random
#initialize scoring variables
#round score
rscore = 0
#total score
tscore = 0

Param.name: Begin Routine
Param.val:
prob=randint(1,(probability)) #probability for earning points

selectBlock=randint(1,3) #randomly selects easy or hard trial 

theProbText=(probText)

hardMoney=randint(2,5) #earn 2-4 points on hard trials

hardMoneyText=hardMoney 

winH=rscore+hardMoney

hardMoneyText="""Press B for Hard Task\n%s Points""" %hardMoney

if not countdownStarted:
 countdownClock = core.CountdownTimer(5)
 countdownStarted = True
#5 second timer

Param.name: End Routine
Param.val:
#Press A for easy, B for hard, otherwise chosen randomly after 5 secs
if resp.keys=='a': 
 nRepsA=1
 nRepsB=0
elif resp.keys=='b':
 nRepsA=0
 nRepsB=1
elif selectBlock==1:
 nRepsA=0
 nRepsB=1
else:
 nRepsA=1
 nRepsB=0
#
countdownStarted = False

Param.name: Each Frame
Param.val:
timeRemaining = countdownClock.getTime()

if timeRemaining <= 0.0:
 continueRoutine = False
 countdownStarted = False

Param.name: text
Param.val:
Choose Your Task:

Probability of win:

Press A for Easy Task
1 point

Param.name: Begin Routine
Param.val:
if popped==True:
 feedbackText="You completed the task!"
else:
 feedbackText="You failed to complete the task."

Param.name: Each Frame
Param.val:
if event.getKeys(['space']):
 npumps+=1
 if npumps>=maxPumps:
 popped=True
 continueRoutine=False

Param.name: Begin Routine
Param.val:
if not countdownStarted:
 countdownClock = core.CountdownTimer(7)
 countdownStarted = True
#7 second timer

Param.name: Each Frame
Param.val:
timeRemaining = countdownClock.getTime()

if timeRemaining <= 0.0:
 continueRoutine = False # end this trial immediately
 countdownStarted = False

Param.name: Begin Experiment
Param.val:
dhand = "bob"
ndhand = "jim"
if expInfo['Handedness'].lower().startswith("r") == True:
 dhand = "right"
 ndhand = "left"
elif expInfo['Handedness'].lower().startswith("l") == True:
 dhand = "left"
 ndhand = "right"
else:
 dhand = "JimBob"
 ndhand = "JimBob"
instr_msg = "You will complete multiple rounds of a game.

In each round, you may choose the rounds difficulty.

Easy rounds require you to use your %s index finger to push the SPACEBAR multiple times to fill the meter.

Hard rounds require you to use your %s pinky finger to push the SPACEBAR multiple times to fill the meter.

Easy rounds are worth 1 point.

Hard rounds are worth 2 to 4 points.

For each round, you must fill the meter to earn points and you will have a high, medium, or low chance of earning points in each round.

If you do not choose the round difficulty within 5 seconds, the difficulty will be chosen randomly for you.

Do you have any questions?

Press ENTER to continue." %(dhand, ndhand)

bar_textE = "Use your %s index finger." %dhand
bar_textH = "Use your %s pinky finger." %ndhand

instr_msg2 = "Do you have any questions?

You will now complete 20 minutes worth of rounds. Your goal is to earn as many points as possible.

REMEMBER:
Easy rounds take less time BUT earn only 1 point.
Hard rounds take more time BUT earn more points.

On easy rounds, use your %s index finger.
On hard rounds, use your %s pinky finger.

Press ENTER to begin." %(dhand, ndhand)

Param.name: Begin Routine
Param.val:
#reset round score to 0
rscore = 0
winE=rscore+1
npumps=0
maxPumps=30 #max presses to complete a trial

Param.name: End Routine
Param.val:
#probability 3 is 50%, 26 is 88%, 51 is 12% chance to earn points
if (probability)==3:
 if prob==1:
 if npumps>=maxPumps:
 rscore=rscore+1

elif (probability)==26:
 if prob>3:
 if npumps>=maxPumps:
 rscore=rscore+1

elif (probability)==51:
 if prob<7:
 if npumps>=maxPumps:
 rscore=rscore+1
#add current round score to total score
tscore += rscore

repsA.addData('# of presses', npumps)
repsA.addData('round score', rscore)

Param.name: Each Frame
Param.val:
if event.getKeys(['space']):
 npumps+=1
 if npumps>=maxPumps:
 popped=True
 continueRoutine=False

Param.name: Begin Routine
Param.val:
if not countdownStarted:
 countdownClock = core.CountdownTimer(7)
 countdownStarted = True
#7 second timer

Param.name: Each Frame
Param.val:
timeRemaining = countdownClock.getTime()

if timeRemaining <= 0.0:
 continueRoutine = False # end this trial immediately
 countdownStarted = False

In each round, you may choose the rounds difficulty.

Easy rounds require you to use your %s index finger to push the SPACEBAR multiple times to fill the meter.

Hard rounds require you to use your %s pinky finger to push the SPACEBAR multiple times to fill the meter.

Easy rounds are worth 1 point.

Hard rounds are worth 2 to 4 points.

For each round, you must fill the meter to earn points and you will have a high, medium, or low chance of earning points in each round.

If you do not choose the round difficulty within 5 seconds, the difficulty will be chosen randomly for you.

bar_textE = "Use your %s index finger." %dhand
bar_textH = "Use your %s pinky finger." %ndhand

Param.val:
#Set ExpTime variable to 0 on the first loop only
if trials1.thisN == 0:
 ExpTime = globalClock.getTime()

Param.name: Each Frame
Param.val:
#End trials1 if 20 minutes have passed
if globalClock.getTime() - ExpTime >= 1200.0:
 trials1.finished = True

Param.name: Begin Experiment
